ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: I'm Baaaaaaaack
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe you have to manually lay out the lines and junk as you go through the zone in order to make the map. It doesn t just make it automatically like
ygData.messageBody:
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@y...>
> wrote:
> EQ-Toolbox is now carrying the LDoN maps. They are very helpful, as
> are the rest of zones. But EQAtlas is still the best resource for
> what is in the zone, and where. He doesn't update it anymore but he
> does take submissions.
>
> I've tried the hunt the area idea and get nothing on my maps. Even
> though I've spent days in a zone, and in my younger days weeks!
>
> Tuldayen
>
I believe you have to manually lay out the lines and junk as you go through
the zone in order to make the map. It doesn't just make it automatically
like other games.
luv,
-Su
